job.title: Site Reliability Engineer // NYC // Cloud
job.description: A global leader in analytics consulting and technology is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their NYC-based team. This fast-growing company helps top-tier clients through marketing optimization, improved customer insights, and data-driven decisioning.<br><br>As an SRE, you will be responsible for transforming the existing DevOps framework. You will focus on automation, CI/CD, container orchestration, infrastructure as code (IaC), and security.<br><br><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience </li> <li>Working experience in both AWD and Azure environments </li> <li>Proficient scripting in Bash, Python, and/or PowerShell </li> <li>Understanding of Docker </li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>The Offer<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Competitive Salary: Up to $145K/year, DOE</li> <li>10% bonus </li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>You Will Receive The Following Benefits<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Comprehensive health insurance </li> <li>401(k)</li> <li>Generous PTO</li> <li>Continued training/education programs</li> <br><br></ul><em>Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.<br><br></em><strong>Posted By:</strong> Carolyn Regimbal<br><br>
